title: The End of Zero: Prepare for a World With Higher Rates
sub_head: Inflation and tight job markets are forcing the hands of central banks to end an era of ultra-low interest rates. The results will be profound.
body:
This is the first column in a Heard on the Street series about the end of zero interest rates.
Warren Buffett has compared interest rates to gravity. That is an especially useful way to think about them right now.
